thread.section_title: Babbel.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Babbel.com | babbel.com
thread.title: Cory

author: Cory
title: Cory
text: I like the fact that I can practice without speaking aloud into the microphone. I often travel for work and when I am in transit I don't want to disturb people around me by repeating strings of words. I like the fact that it explains the different uses and contexts of words. I like spelling the words or phrases back because I retain information better when I have to write it down or in this case type it into my device. I like that the lessons are broken down into manageable time frames to fit my busy lifestyle. The only way I'd give it the full 5 stars would be if it came attached with a teacher that I could access when ever I needed one.
